title: Re: Gay/Lesiban Marriages
content:
Well, I have a few points to make:

[quote]Quote:[hr]Gay marriage will encourage people to be gay, in the same way that hanging around tall people will make you tall.[hr][/quote]

While being tall is a [mostly] physical trait, unaffectable by association, it is possible that being gay is not and that, if it is a [at least in some people] psychological or has a psychological component then it is possible that association will indeed cause suspectible peoiple to become gay. Such peer pressure cocertion has been demonstrated with other behaviours, but not homosexuality yet. Wether gay marrige itself will cause this is doubtful.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Legalizing gay marriage will open the door to all kinds of crazy behavior. People may even wish to marry their pets because a dog has legal standing and can sign a marriage contract.[hr][/quote]

Sadly, this is indeed true [Although peopel have already married their pets, and even rocks] This is known as 'the slippery slope' and is often used as a defense against legalizing an undesired behaviour or substance. It has been shown that once anything is legalized there is a tendency for things to get 'worse' patenting of a strain of bacteria for example has resulted in the modern trend of patenting whole lifeforms and genes, even though the initial case was specifically mentioned as not a right to do so under any circumstances. So it is likely that once gay marrige is legalized others will use it as an excuse to attempt to legalize something else, much as if legalizing voluntary relationships between underage teens could be used to support paedophilia [And has by NAMBLA]. This shouldn't necessarily prevent gay marrige being legalized, but people should be aware.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Straight marriage has been around a long time and hasn't changed at all; women are still property, blacks still can't marry whites, and divorce is still illegal.[hr][/quote]

Well, it depends what you mean by 'hasn't changed' and 'long time' Peoples memories are short.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Straight marriage will be less meaningful if gay marriage were allowed; the sanctity of Britney Spears' 55-hour just-for-fun marriage would be destroyed.[hr][/quote]

I think it'd be *more* meaningful, the fact that these people will fight for something that many consider an outdated piece of paper shows how powerful marrige is.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Children can never succeed without a male and a female role model at home. That's why we as a society expressly forbid single parents to raise children.[hr][/quote]

This appears, at least at some levels to be true; it appears children instinctively seek out both male and female role models to emulate and shape their behaviours. While figures for gay mariges are not avalible, single parent familiy chldren have been shown to have a much lower quality of life and inteligence. Gay marriges are theorized to be better as there will be two loving and supportive [we can hope] parents to raise the child and role models do not have to be parents.

[quote]Quote:[hr]Gay marriage will change the foundation of society; we could never adapt to new social norms. Just like we haven't adapted to cars, the service-sector economy, or longer life spans.[hr][/quote]

They will change society, but like most things, will take a few years, we'll adapt.
